description:
Location: City of Industry, California

Salary: Up to $80,000 annually

Job Type: Full-Time

Company Overview:

Join a dynamic and growing company in the heart of the City of Industry, California! We are committed to delivering high-quality products and exceptional service to our clients. We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Demand Planner to join our team and help drive our strategic planning and inventory management processes.

Position Overview:

As a Demand Planner, you will play a crucial role in forecasting customer demand, managing inventory levels, and ensuring optimal product availability. You will collaborate with various departments to analyze market trends, identify potential supply chain issues, and develop strategies to meet customer needs effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain accurate demand forecasts using historical data, market trends, and sales input.
  • Monitor inventory levels and adjust forecasts to ensure product availability while minimizing excess stock.
  • Collaborate with sales, marketing, and supply chain teams to align forecasts with business objectives and promotional activities.
  • Analyze demand patterns and market data to identify opportunities for improvement and potential risks.
  • Prepare and present reports on demand trends, forecast accuracy, and inventory performance.
  • Manage the demand planning process and coordinate with suppliers to ensure timely delivery of products.
  • Utilize forecasting tools and software to optimize inventory management and forecasting accuracy.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, Economics, or a related field preferred
  • 2+ years of experience in demand planning, inventory management, or a similar role.
  • Strong analytical skills with proficiency in Excel and demand planning software (e.g., SAP, Oracle, or similar).
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to work collaboratively across departments.
  • Detail-oriented with strong organizational and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.
  • Monday - Friday regular office hours

Why Join Us?

  • Competitive salary of up to $80,000 annually.
  • Opportunity to work in a supportive and collaborative team environment.
  • Career growth and development opportunities.
  • Comprehensive benefits package, including health, dental, and vision insurance.
  • Convenient location in the City of Industry, California.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their qualifications and experience.

Pay Details: $70,000.00 to $80,000.00 per year

Search managed by: Wulfrano Pineda

Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled

To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please navigate to https://www.lhh.com/us/en/candidate-privacy

The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records subject to federal contractor requirements and/or security clearance requirements.
